sentences.english: EVOIL? ALMOND exhibits greater stability over time due to the addition of natural tocopherols.
sentences.chinese: 通过添加天然生育酚，甜杏仁油的稳定性很强。
燕麦，亚麻籽，蓝莓和杏仁。

sentences.english: Then mix in the raisins and chopped almonds.
sentences.chinese: 然后用手将提子和杏仁碎揉入。

sentences.english: Almonds contain lots of oxalates and should be eaten only in moderation.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁含有大量草酸，应该适量食用。

sentences.english: Firstly with almond aroma, full with intense and lovely peach aroma.
sentences.chinese: 入口杏仁味和白桃果味丰厚，活泼可喜，酸度充足。

sentences.english: Almond tea was introduced by the civil court of a snack.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁茶是由宫廷传入民间的一种风味小吃。

sentences.english: Delicately fragranced with Almond Flowers and Honey.
sentences.chinese: 散发淡淡的清香与杏仁花和蜂蜜。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in the flour, baking soda, and almonds until well mixed.
sentences.chinese: 离火拌入面粉，苏打粉，还有杏仁片，混合均匀。

sentences.english: The amygdala is a brain region best known for regulating emotion.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁体是大脑的一个著名区域，负责调节情感。

sentences.english: The reactions of the amygdala are so quick that they are for all intents automatic.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁核的反应是如此之快以至于它们几乎是无意识的。

sentences.english: All almonds undergo mandatory pasteurization to remove poison and bacteria -- which has stirred up food controversy since 2007.
sentences.chinese: 所有的杏仁都要经过消毒以除去其中的病毒和细菌。

sentences.english: Almond-shaped, set at medium height, the distance between them must be wide.
sentences.chinese: 杏仁状，中等高度为，它们之间的距离必须广泛。

sentences.english: They decided to try simultaneously activating DLSC while inhibiting the amygdala.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定尝试在激活DLSC的同时抑制杏仁核。

sentences.english: California grows the most and best almonds in the world.
sentences.chinese: 美国加州是世界上大杏仁的最主要产地。

sentences.english: Deliciously sour hibiscus and blackcurrant support the intense almond amaretto flavour.
sentences.chinese: 美味芙蓉和黑醋栗的，杏仁阿玛丽托味道。

sentences.english: Finely chop the almonds and prepare a sheet pan with parchment.
sentences.chinese: 把杏仁剁碎，准备一个羊皮纸内衬平底锅。

definition: peach kernel, used in Chinese medicine
